Section.Catchline: Service representatives, managing general agents; managers; activities.

SectionBody.Text: Individuals employed by insurers or their managers, general agents, or representatives as service representatives, and as managing general agents employed for the purpose of or engaged in assisting agents in negotiating and effecting contracts of insurance, shall engage in such activities when, and only when, accompanied by an agent duly licensed and appointed as a resident licensee and appointee under this code.
